Song.title: You Are Our Hope
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Doug Plank © 2011 Sovereign Grace Worship / Sovereign Grace Music

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G#m | Bmaj7/F# | Emaj7 (repeat)]
Verse 1: [G#m7]Comfort for weary sinners, [Bmaj7/F#]strength for the struggling saint [Emaj7]Jesus Christ has risen from the gr[B]ave [F#] [G#m7]Peace when the waves are pounding, when [Bmaj7/F#]voices of hope sound faint [Emaj7]Jesus Christ has risen from the gr[B]ave [F#] How can [G#m]grief re[E]main{,} when our [C#m9]Savior [F#]reigns?
Chorus: You are our [B]hope, You are our joy You are our [G#m7]overcoming King So we sing, “[Emaj7]Hallel[G#m7]ujah, [C#m]Jesus is al[F#]ive!” Risen from [B]death, ascended on high Glorious [G#m7]by the Father’s side So we sing, “[Emaj7]Hallel[G#m7]ujah, [C#m]Jesus is al[F#]ive!”
Verse 2: [G#m7]Power to fight temptation, the [Bmaj7/F#]world and the Devil’s lies [Emaj7]Jesus Christ has risen from the gr[B]ave [F#] [G#m7]Purpose in all our suffering, and [Bmaj7/F#]joy that will never die [Emaj7]Jesus Christ has risen from the gr[B]ave [F#] How can [G#m]grief re[E]main{,} when our [C#m9]Savior [F#]reigns?
Bridge: [E2]Jesus,[B/D#] victorious[C#m7] in the [F#/A#]heavens exalted [E2]Jesus,[B/D#] give us[C#m7] eyes to [F#/A#]see Your glory [E2]Jesus,[B/D#] victorious[C#m7] in the [F#/A#]heavens exalted [E2]Jesus,[B/D#] give us[C#m7] eyes to [F#/A#]see Your glory
